contrasts.dg_description: Pairwise motion - orientation for cardinal then averaged together (e.g., upward motion - horizontal orientation)
contrasts.da_description: Pairwise motion - orientation for polar cardinal (e.g., outward motion - annulus orientation)

contrasts.dg_description: Pairwise motion - orientation for oblique then averaged together (e.g., upper rightwards motion - upper leftwards orientated grating)
contrasts.da_description: Pairwise motion - orientation for spiral then averaged together (e.g., upper rightwards spiral motion - upper leftwards spiral orientated grating)

contrasts.dg_description: Mean of all 8 translating directions - mean of all 4 orientations
contrasts.da_description: Mean of all 8 in/out/spiral directions - mean of all 4 annuli/spiral/pinwheel orientations

contrasts.da_description: Mean of all 8 in/out/spiral directions - blank trial (pink noise)

contrasts.da_description: Polar oblique (spiral) motion averaged - blank trial (pink noise)
